mapper.select: select storytitle from fairytale where storynum = ( select storynum from myselection where selectionnum = #{selectionnum} )

select o.ordernum as ordernum ,o.selectionnum as selectionnum ,m.id as id ,o.orderdate as orderdate ,o.bookcover as bookcover ,o.currentstate as currentstate ,o.price as price from orderbook o, myselection m where o.selectionnum = m.selectionnum and m.id = #{id} and o.currentstate = 'addToCart' order by ordernum
select ordernum , title , receiver , address , phone ,to_char(orderdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24miss') as orderdate from CONFIRMEDORDERINFO where orderer = #{id} order by orderdate

select ordernum from orderbook where ordernum in ( select max(ordernum) from orderbook group by bookcover ) and selectionnum in( select selectionnum from myselection where storynum=( select storynum from myselection where selectionnum = #{selectionnum} ) and id='ryan' ) and bookcover != 'default'
